amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investing in advanced fossil energy technology research and development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 694 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 694 proposed by Senator Manchin. (consideration: CR S1878; text: CR S1878) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to investing in advanced fossil energy technology research and development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 694 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 694 proposed by Senator Manchin.
